name: Lytro Developers
body:
### Welcome to Lytro Developers Page
This will be the home of more information about the Light Field Picture Player. We are currently working towards getting this open sourced and are excited to be sharing more details with you shortly.

If you are interested in getting Light Field pictures on your website, check out the following embed instructions: https://support.lytro.com/hc/en-us/articles/200864610-Introduction-to-Embedding-Lytro-Living-Pictures.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
